name: steam
description: Lets you interface with Steam without running an actual Steam client
author: Nicholas <vvnicholas@gmail.com>

scripts.prepublish: svn checkout https://github.com/SteamRE/SteamKit/trunk/Resources/Protobufs resources/protobufs && svn checkout https://github.com/SteamRE/SteamKit/trunk/Resources/SteamLanguage resources/steam_language
